endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of all rental properties.
Create a new rental property entry.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific property using its ID.
Update information for a specific property by its ID.
Retrieve a list of all tenants associated with the properties.
Add a new tenant to a property.
Retrieve details about a specific tenant using their ID.
Submit a new maintenance request for a property.
Retrieve the history of rental payments for all properties.
Create a new rental agreement between a landlord and a tenant.
